 (let [psi (* 2 q/PI (+ (/ s 3) (* r l)))
 lg (q/pow l g)
 a (* h lg (/ (- 1 lg) 2))]

 [-0.29227 -0.90649]
 [1.97294 0.0]])

 (m/+ lg)
 (m/* 255)
 (m/map q/round)

 (flatten))))" "(defn astro-intensity [l s r h g]

 " "(defn radix-sort [num-seq]
 (loop [radix-seq (map (fn [num] {:num num :quot num}) num-seq)]
 (if (every? zero? (map #(quot (:quot %) 10) radix-seq))
 radix-seq
 (recur
 (loop [new-seq (vec (repeat 10 []))
 old-seq radix-seq]
 (if (empty? old-seq)
 new-seq
 (recur
 (update
 new-seq
 (mod (:quot (first old-seq)) 10)
 (fn [bucket]
 (let [num (:num (first old-seq))
 quot1 (:quot (first old-seq))]
 (conj bucket {:num num :quot (if (zero? (quot quot1 10))
 quot1
 (quot quot1 10))}))))
 (rest old-seq))))))))" "(defn radix-sort [num-seq]

 new-seq

 quot1 (:quot (first old-seq))]

 quot1

 (radix-sort num-seq))" "(defn draw-branch [step node pos]
 (when (pos? step)
 (let [next-step (dec step)]
 (apply q/stroke (proportional-map 0 30 0 1 10))
 (if-let [n (try-fork node)]
 (do
 (draw-branch next-step n (draw-line pos next-step -12))
 (recur next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos next-step 12)))
 (recur next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos next-step 2))))))" "(proportional-map 0 30 0 1 10)" "(defn draw-branch [step node pos]
 (q/text (str node) (:x pos) (:y pos))
 (when (pos? step)
 (let [next-step (dec step)]
 (apply q/stroke (my-color-scheme (proportional-map 0 25 0.2 0.8 step)))
 (if-let [n (try-fork node)]
 (do
 (draw-branch next-step n (draw-line pos step 12))
 (recur next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos step 0)))
 (recur next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos step 0))))))" "(proportional-map 0 20 0.2 0.8 14)" "13" "(proportional-map 0 20 0.2 0.8 13)" "(my-color-scheme (proportional-map 0 20 0.2 0.8 13))" "(my-color-scheme (proportional-map 0 20 0.2 0.8 14))" "(q/defsketch collatz-conjecture

 :middleware [m/fun-mode m/navigation-2d])" "(defn draw-branch [depth {:keys [odd even not-forks] :as declinations} step node pos]
 (when (< node depth)
 (let [color (my-color-scheme (proportional-map 1 175 0 1 (- depth step)))
 width (proportional-map 1 175 5 0.1 (- depth step))
 len 6; (proportional-map depth 7930 10 1 step)
 next-step (dec step)]
 (if-let [n (try-fork node)]
 (do
 (draw-branch depth declinations next-step n (draw-line pos odd len color width))
 (recur depth declinations next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos even len color width)))
 (recur depth declinations next-step (* 2 node) (draw-line pos not-forks len color width))))))" "(q/defsketch collatz-conjecture

 (q/frame-rate 30)
 (-> {:show-info {:frame-rate true}
 :defaults {:depth 20000
 :root 1

 :even -20

 :decl (cycle (concat
 (repeat 15 -0.02) (linspace -0.02 0.02 50)

 87 :reset-not-forks-angle
 69 :inc-not-forks-angle
 65 :dec-even-angle
 83 :reset-even-angle

 90 :dec-odd-angle

 67 :inc-odd-angle
 82 :inc-init-angle
 84 :reset-init-angle

 71 :reset-root
 72 :dec-root
 86 :inc-depth
 66 :reset-depth

 (reset-values)))" "(ns collatz-conjecture.scratch

 next-step (inc step)
 next-width (proportional-map 0 max-depth 1.3 0.1 next-step)]
 (if (= 2 (count (zip/children node)))

 (let [next-node (zip/right next-node)
 next-color (my-color-scheme-memo (proportional-map 0 20000 0 1 (zip/node next-node)))]
 (recur max-depth declinations next-node (draw-line pos even next-len next-color next-width) next-step)))

 next-step (inc step)
 next-len 8
 next-color (my-color-scheme-memo (proportional-map 0 max-depth 0 1 step))
 next-height (height next-node)
 next-opacity (proportional-map 0 (- max-depth next-step) 127 255 next-height)
 next-color (concat next-color [next-opacity])
 _ (println next-height " " next-step)
 next-width (proportional-map 0 next-height 2 0.5 next-step)] ;(proportional-map max-val 7930 10 1 step)
 (if (= 2 (count (zip/children node)))
 (do
 (draw-branch max-depth declinations next-node (draw-line pos odd next-len next-color next-width) next-step)
 (let [next-node (zip/right next-node)
 next-color (my-color-scheme-memo (proportional-map 0 max-depth 0 1 step))
 next-height (height next-node)
 next-opacity (proportional-map 0 (- max-depth next-step) 127 255 next-height)
 next-color (concat next-color [next-opacity])
 next-width (proportional-map 0 next-height 2 0.5 next-step)]
 (recur max-depth declinations next-node (draw-line pos even next-len next-color next-width) next-step)))
 (recur max-depth declinations next-node (draw-line pos not-forks next-len next-color next-width) next-step))))))" "(q/defsketch collatz-conjecture
 :size [1334 750]
 :setup setup
 :update update-state
 :key-pressed key-pressed
 :draw draw-state
 :info-provider info-provider
 :middleware [m/fun-mode
 show-info])" "(q/defsketch collatz-conjecture
 :size [1334 750]
 :setup setup
 ;:update update-state

 :draw draw-state
 :info-provider info-provider

 :size [1334 750]

 ;:update update-state
 :key-pressed key-pressed
 :draw draw-state
 :info-provider info-provider
 :middleware [m/fun-mode
 ;show-info])
 ;record-gif])
 m/navigation-2d])" "(defn update-state [state]
 (println (:flag state) (:max-val state))
 (-> state
 (update :decl rest)
 (update :max-val (partial (if (:flag state) + -) 100))
 (cond->
 (or (and (:flag state) (>= (:max-val state) 600))
 (and (not (:flag state)) (<= (:max-val state) 100)))
 (update :flag not))
 (reset-collatz-zipper)
 (reset-max-depth)))" "(defn update-state [state]
 (println (:flag state) (:max-val state))
 (-> state
 (update :decl rest)
 (cond->
 (or (and (:flag state) (>= (:max-val state) 600))
 (and (not (:flag state)) (<= (:max-val state) 100)))
 (update :flag not))
 (update :max-val (partial + (if (:flag state) +100 -100)))
 (reset-collatz-zipper)
 (reset-max-depth)))" "(defn update-state [state]
 (-> (cond-> state
 (or (and (:flag state) (>= (:max-val state) 600))
 (and (not (:flag state)) (<= (:max-val state) 100)))
 (update :flag not))
 #(update % :max-val (partial + (if (:flag %) +100 -100)))
 (reset-collatz-zipper)
 (reset-max-depth)
 (update :decl rest)))" "(defn record-gif [options]
 (let [draw (:draw options (fn []))
 updated-draw (fn [state]
 (draw state)
 (g/save-animation "conjecture.gif" 300 0))]
 (assoc options :draw updated-draw)))"], :remote []}}
